name: Frost Thee
description:
Santa has crashed his sled and needs help keeping his fire going so he doesn't freeze to death! Watch out! Wolves are attacking him too!

Entry to the TPS Official Micro Game Jam (Christmas Edition)

Made by:
Pozitronic - Trilby wearer and stage 5 super atheist
Alephlol - Rick and Morty ultra fan. Pixel Art connoisseur
Heerokazen - Favorite movie(s): The Avengers. Basically anything Marvel
